name: Altstoff Recycling Austria AG
goal:
Austria?s leading packaging compliance scheme, Altstoff Recycling Austria AG (ARA), offers a full compliance service to all businesses that are subject to the Austrian Packaging Ordinance. We have organised and financed the collection, sorting and recovery of packaging waste throughout Austria since 1993. Around 1.6 million collection bins are available to consumers across Austria for the collection of paper, plastic, metal, and glass packaging. In addition, around 1.5 million households are covered by our kerbside collection service for light-weight packaging. In cooperation with local municipalities, we also offer more than 1,000 material recycling yards (MRF) nationwide.

With a total of more than 760,000 tonnes of packaging waste collected per year, we play an important role in providing Austrian businesses with raw materials. Our collection and recovery services help save more than 600,000 tonnes in carbon equivalents.

As a Producer Responsibility Organization (PRO), ARA operates on a non-profit basis and is owned by leading Austrian companies. The packaging recovery and recycling service is financed by our 16,000 business customers.
